title: post submit valid feedback
description: Test POST /submit with valid name, email, and message fields to ensure the feedback is accepted, stored with an auto-incremented id and ISO timestamp, and a 200 success response is returned.

title: post submit missing required fields
description: Test POST /submit with missing required fields such as name, email, or message to verify the server returns a 400 error with appropriate validation error messages.

title: post submit invalid email format
description: Test POST /submit with an email field that does not contain an '@' character to confirm the server returns a 400 error indicating invalid email format.

title: post submit whitespace only fields
description: Test POST /submit with fields containing only whitespace to ensure the server returns a 400 error indicating empty or invalid fields.

title: get feedbacks returns all stored feedbacks
description: Test GET /feedbacks to verify it returns a 200 response with a JSON array of all stored feedback objects, each containing id, name, email, message, and timestamp.

title: get feedbacks returns empty array when no submissions
description: Test GET /feedbacks when the feedbacks.json file is empty or freshly initialized to confirm it returns a 200 response with an empty array or initial seed array.

title: post submit concurrent requests id collision
description: Test concurrent POST /submit requests to observe potential id collisions due to auto-increment logic and verify both requests succeed with 200 responses and entries are appended.

title: get root serves frontend html
description: Test GET / to ensure the server responds with 200 status and serves the static frontend files including index.html, script.js, and style.css.

title: get nonexistent static asset returns 404
description: Test GET request for a non-existent static asset to verify the server returns a 404 status indicating the asset is not found.
